EmailTemplate.subject: How you will be paid for your role with The Challenge Network
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. This email was sent from an unattended mailbox, and replies are not reviewed. Please instead contact your Staffing representative on {!Job_placement__c.Staffing_Associate_email__c}
Dear {!Job_placement__c.Contact_Name__c},
Congratulations on being appointed as {!Job_placement__c.Role__c} with The Challenge Network t on {!Job_placement__c.Wave__c}.
Your total pay for this part of your role will be {!Job_placement__c.Total_gross_pay__c}, which is subject to tax and national insurance deductions. It will be paid on {!Job_placement__c.Payroll_payment_date__c}. Tax and NI deductions will happen from this payment.
You will receive further information about your pay relating to Real Challenge Action weekends etc. in due course.
This payment structure has two principles: (a) to ensure that staff members pay the appropriate level of tax in the correct month and (b) to enable staff members to receive payment.
Yours sincerely,
{!Job_placement__c.Staffing_Associate__c} The Challenge Network e: {!Job_placement__c.Staffing_Associate_email__c} CR 2.4.1
